Package cs1302.game

Class MinesweeperGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
  • public class MinesweeperGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles the Minesweeper game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MinesweeperGame​(java.util.Scanner stdIn, java.lang.String seedPath)
      Constructs a MinesweeperGame object that is the current game being played.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void checkSeed()
      Checks certain elements of the seed file to determine if it is valid or malformed.
      void createBoard()
      Creates the minesweeper 2D arrays, as stated in readSeed().
      boolean isWon()
      Determines whether or not the game has been won yet.
      void noFog()
      Reveals the locations of the mines for one turn.
      void play()
      The main method that controls the flow of the minesweeperGame.
      void printFiles​(java.lang.String fileLocation)
      Prints the contents of an input file to standard output.
      void printLoss()
      Prints the loss art.
      void printMineField()
      Prints the iBoard[][] array to standard output, along with the row and column numbers and | markers.
      void printWelcome()
      Prints the welcome art using printFiles(String).
      void printWin()
      Prints the win art and the user's score.
      void promptUser()
      Prompts the user for command input from stdIn, then handles the input based on their command.
      void readSeed()
      Takes the seed file and assigns rows, cols, numMines and mineSpots[] and creates bBoard[][], iBoard[][] and backBoard[][] for the game, given the seed file is not malformed.
      void reveal​(int row, int col)
      Reveals the input square.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MinesweeperGame

        public MinesweeperGame​(java.util.Scanner stdIn,
                       java.lang.String seedPath)
        Constructs a MinesweeperGame object that is the current game being played.
        Parameters:
        stdIn - Standard input from user
        seedPath - location of seed file

    • Method Detail

      • readSeed

        public void readSeed()
        Takes the seed file and assigns rows, cols, numMines and mineSpots[] and creates bBoard[][], iBoard[][] and backBoard[][] for the game, given the seed file is not malformed.

      • checkSeed

        public void checkSeed()
        Checks certain elements of the seed file to determine if it is valid or malformed.

      • createBoard

        public void createBoard()
        Creates the minesweeper 2D arrays, as stated in readSeed().

      • printMineField

        public void printMineField()
        Prints the iBoard[][] array to standard output, along with the row and column numbers and | markers.

      • promptUser

        public void promptUser()
        Prompts the user for command input from stdIn, then handles the input based on their command. Will call reveal() or noFog() if those commands are input.

      • reveal

        public void reveal​(int row,
                   int col)
        Reveals the input square.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index of the square
        col - the col index of the square

      • noFog

        public void noFog()
        Reveals the locations of the mines for one turn.

      • isWon

        public boolean isWon()
        Determines whether or not the game has been won yet.
        Returns:
        true is the game has been won; false otherwise.

      • printWelcome

        public void printWelcome()
        Prints the welcome art using printFiles(String).

      • printWin

        public void printWin()
        Prints the win art and the user's score.

      • printLoss

        public void printLoss()
        Prints the loss art.

      • printFiles

        public void printFiles​(java.lang.String fileLocation)
        Prints the contents of an input file to standard output.
        Parameters:
        fileLocation - the path to the desired file to be output

      • play

        public void play()
        The main method that controls the flow of the minesweeperGame. Uses readSeed(), createBoard(), printWelcome(), printMineField(), isWon(), promptUser(), and printWin().
